content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI received a command to google "Michigan State University guide to the trees of Michigan pdf", but my computer returned an error message stating that the file could not be found. However, I received a response from the command now which gave me a list of resources related to tree identification in Michigan, including a guide from the MSU website, a virtual map of the MSU Campus Arboretum, a self-guided tree tour of the West Circle Dr. area of MSU, a coloring book, and a forestry research guide from the MSU Libraries.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "download_file", "args": {"url": "https://www.canr.msu.edu/resources/identifying-trees-of-michigan-e2332-revised-2022", "filename": "Identifying_Trees_of_Michigan_E2332_Revised_2022.pdf"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command download_file returned: Command 'download_file' is disabled: Error: You do not have user authorization to download files locally."}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.canr.msu.edu/resources/identifying-trees-of-michigan-e2332-revised-2022", "question": "How can I access the \'Identifying Trees of Michigan: E2332 Revised 2022\' publication?"}}}'}]
"""
